channel.title: ::makemem command
channel.description:
Is there any way you can make it so you can do ::makemem playername instead of ::makememplayername
Also, is it possible to make it to where you only have to kick them once instead of twice?

item.title: ::makemem command
item.dc:creator: @FusionLord FusionLord
item.description:
@FusionLord wrote:

we can help if you dont tell us

Read full topic

item.title: ::makemem command
item.dc:creator: @_Java6 `Java
item.description:
@_Java6 wrote:

… I already know the command I need to know how to… nevermind.

Read full topic

item.title: ::makemem command
item.dc:creator: @runefreak10 runefreak10
item.description:
@runefreak10 wrote:

[quote=“FusionLord, post:2, topic:248916”]for the make member here

else if (command.startsWith("makemem") && playerRights >= 3) {{
	try {
		String victim = command.substring(7);
		sendMessage(""+victim+"");
		BufferedWriter bw = null;
	bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("data/members.txt", true));
	bw.write(""+victim+"");
	bw.newLine();
	bw.flush();
		} 
	catch(IOException ioexception) {
			misc.println("membership.txt: error loading file.");
		}
	}
}

but on the kicking thing i need to know what you are talking about[/quote]

That or ::membership might be in your server

Read full topic
